page.title: 04GAMES
page.content: In the school yard we play many games. The most popular is Tig.This is played like a normal game, but we have to run from one circle to the other.We play marbles at school. We swap them with other people and also we try to hit another marble when it is stationary.The boys play football,and the girls often bring a skipping rope and we experimentto find different ways of jumping in and outwhen the rope is being turned, with out stopping it.We also play a game called Red Rover.Both boys and girls play it.What we do is have two teams, each team stands in a line and holds hands.One team, asks a member of the other team to try and break threw the line.We have different crazes at different times.
